AI Description: HOMER (Hypergeometric Optimization of Motif EnRichment) is a suite of tools for motif discovery and next-gen sequencing analysis. It is widely used for identifying transcription factor binding sites and novel motifs in DNA sequences.
Core Features: 1. Motif discovery in DNA sequences. 2. Identification of transcription factor binding sites. 3. Next-generation sequencing data analysis. 4. De novo motif discovery. 5. Integration with various genomic databases.
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Next-Generation Sequencing, Motif Discovery, Transcription Factor Binding Sites
